name: Puzzle Fuzzle
description:
Do you have great imagination? You will need it to solve puzzles now!

Try to combine the item according to the text tip above, using the elements below. All elements are from irrelevant items and they can be rotated as you wish. Figure it out what parts you need and how to place it to clear the level!

Think and take it easy~

Features:
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Suitable for all ages
* Cute images meet wonderful imagination, to be surprised by the amazing idea!
